function onSave()
    saved_data = JSON.encode({
                                svinGame=inGame,
                                svphaseNumber=phaseNumber,
                                svcheckEnd=checkEnd,
                                svdeploySelected=deploySelected,
                                svareaPlaced=areaPlaced,
                                svdeploymentPregamePlaced=deploymentPregamePlaced,
                                svdeploymentIngamePlaced=deploymentIngamePlaced,
                                svitcSelected=itcSelected,
                                svmatSize=matSize
                            })
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
    --self.setPosition({40,-4,0})
    --self.setRotation({180,270,0})
    -- load from saved
    if saved_data ~= "" then
         local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
         inGame = loaded_data.svinGame
         checkEnd= loaded_data.svcheckEnd
         phaseNumber=loaded_data.svphaseNumber
         deploySelected = loaded_data.svdeploySelected
         areaPlaced= loaded_data.svareaPlaced
         deploymentPregamePlaced= loaded_data.svdeploymentPregamePlaced
         deploymentIngamePlaced= loaded_data.svdeploymentIngamePlaced
         itcSelected = loaded_data.svitcSelected
         matSize=loaded_data.svmatSize
         --itcSelected = numberItcZones+1
    else
        inGame = false
        phaseNumber=0
        checkEnd= false
        deploySelected = numberDeployZones+1
        areaPlaced= false
        deploymentPregamePlaced= false
        deploymentIngamePlaced= false
        itcSelected = numberItcZones+1
        matSize= 2
    end

    --if simulation then print("THIS IS "..currentPhase.." TURN") end
    -- DEPLOY MENU VARIABLES
    deployBag={}
    assignDeployBags()
    tableSide = getObjectFromGUID("35b95f")
    tablePos=tableSide.getPosition()
    manageUI()

    -- ITC OBJECTIVES MENU VARIABLES
    itcBag={}
    itcBag[1]=getObjectFromGUID("0ec042")
    itcBag[2]=getObjectFromGUID("f68f0e")
    itcBag[3]=getObjectFromGUID("a41f35")
    itcBag[4]=getObjectFromGUID("adcb48")
    itcBag[5]=getObjectFromGUID("e3f247")
    itcBag[6]=getObjectFromGUID("49bc0d")
    itcBag[numberItcZones+1]=getObjectFromGUID("866850") -- same as the deploy one
    -- ITC SHEET VARIABLES
    sheetBag={}
    sheetBag[1]=getObjectFromGUID("b31d38")
    sheetBag[2]=getObjectFromGUID("122137")
    areaBag=getObjectFromGUID("9ddefb")
    if allowITCSheets == false then
        itcObjBtn.position={menuX,5,menuZ}
        itcObjBtn.width=6000
        itcObjUpBtn.position={menuX+arrowOffset,5,menuZ}
    end
    -- REST OF CODE
    redTurnCounter=getObjectFromGUID("055302")
    blueTurnCounter=getObjectFromGUID("7e4111")
    gameTurnCounter=getObjectFromGUID("ee92cf")
    if inGame == false then
        broadcastToAll("The mod will keep track of how many times a game is started or a map exported.\nNo other data will be saved!", "Red")
    end
    if deploymentIngamePlaced == true then
        deployIngameBtn.label=deployIngameLblOpen
    else
        deployIngameBtn.label=deployIngameLblClosed
    end
    if areaPlaced == true then
        areaBtn.label=areaLblOpen
    else
        areaBtn.label=areaLblClosed
    end
    if showBagsForModify then
        showBags()
    else
        Wait.frames(hideBags, 2)
    end
    gameTurnCounter.call("checkGameEnd")
    writeMenus()
--KTitems.call("buttonClick_recall")
end

function assignDeployBags()

    deployBagGUID = deployBagGUIDList[2]
    if matSize == 1 then
        deployBagGUID = deployBagGUIDList[1]
        numberDeployZones=6

    end
    if matSize == 2 then
        deployBagGUID = deployBagGUIDList[2]
        numberDeployZones=6

    end
    if matSize == 3 then
        deployBagGUID = deployBagGUIDList[3]
        numberDeployZones=6

    end
    if matSize == 4 then
        deployBagGUID = deployBagGUIDList[4]
        numberDeployZones=6

    end
    --[[

    ]]--
    deployBag[1]=getObjectFromGUID(deployBagGUID[1])
    deployBag[2]=getObjectFromGUID(deployBagGUID[2])
    deployBag[3]=getObjectFromGUID(deployBagGUID[3])
    deployBag[4]=getObjectFromGUID(deployBagGUID[4])
    deployBag[5]=getObjectFromGUID(deployBagGUID[5])
    deployBag[6]=getObjectFromGUID(deployBagGUID[6])
    deployBag[7]=getObjectFromGUID(deployBagGUID[7])
    deployBag[numberDeployZones+1]=getObjectFromGUID("866850") -- none label
    deployBag[numberDeployZones+1].interactable=false
end

function showBags()
    showHideBags(true)
end
function hideBags()
    showHideBags(false)
end


function showHideBags(show)
    local deployBag2= {}
    local deployBagGUID2={}
    if show then
        newY=3
        --newY=-3 --RIC
        tablePos=tableSide.getPosition()
        --tableSide.setPosition({tablePos.x,-19.53,tablePos.z})
    else
        newY=-3

        --tableSide.setPosition({tablePos.x,-19.53,tablePos.z})

    end
    local oldPos={}
    for j=1, #deployBagGUIDList do
        deployBagGUID2=deployBagGUIDList[j]
        for i=1, 7 do
            --if deployBag2[i]~= nil then
                deployBag2[i]= getObjectFromGUID(deployBagGUID2[i])
                oldPos=deployBag2[i].getPosition()
                deployBag2[i].setPosition{oldPos.x,newY,oldPos.z}
                deployBag2[i].interactable=show
                if show == false then
                    deployBag2[i].clearButtons()
                end
            --end
        end
    end
    --[[
    for i=1, numberDeployZones do
        oldPos=deployBag[i].getPosition()
        deployBag[i].setPosition{oldPos.x,newY,oldPos.z}
        deployBag[i].interactable=true
    end
    ]]--
    for i=1, numberItcZones do
        oldPos=itcBag[i].getPosition()
        itcBag[i].setPosition{oldPos.x,newY,oldPos.z}
        itcBag[i].interactable=show
        if show == false then
            itcBag[i].clearButtons()
        end
    end

    for i, guid in ipairs(otherBagsGUID) do
        bag=getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        oldPos=bag.getPosition()
        bag.setPosition{oldPos.x,newY,oldPos.z}
        bag.interactable=show
        if show== false then
            bag.clearButtons()
        end
    end

end


function writeMenus()
    self.clearButtons()
    if inGame == false then
        writeStartMenu()
        writeDeployMenu()
        writeITCObjMenu()
    else
        writeIngameMenu()
    end
end

function writeStartMenu()
    self.createButton(startBtn)
    --self.createButton(phaseNameBtn)
end

function writeDeployMenu()
    if deployMenu == false then
        deployMenuBtn.position={-menuX,5,1.4}
        deployMenuBtn.label=deployLblClosed
    end
    if deployMenu == true then
        deployMenuBtn.position={-menuX,5,menuZ-1.4}
        deployMenuBtn.label=deployLblOpen
        deployBtn.label=deployBag[deploySelected].getName()
        self.createButton(deployBtn)
        self.createButton(deployUpBtn)
        self.createButton(deployDownBtn)

    end
    self.createButton(deployMenuBtn)
end

function writeITCObjMenu()
    if true or matSize ~= 2 then
        return
    end
    if itcObjMenu == false then
        itcObjMenuBtn.position={menuX,5,1.4}
        itcObjMenuBtn.label=itcObjLblClosed
    end
    if itcObjMenu == true then
        itcObjMenuBtn.position={menuX,5,menuZ-1.4}
        itcObjMenuBtn.label=itcObjLblOpen
        itcObjBtn.label=itcBag[itcSelected].getName()
        self.createButton(itcObjBtn)
        self.createButton(itcObjUpBtn)
        self.createButton(itcObjDownBtn)
        if allowITCSheets then
            self.createButton(itcSheetBtn)
        end
    end
    self.createButton(itcObjMenuBtn)
end

function manageUI()
    if phaseNumber==4 then
        Global.UI.setAttribute("command", "active", true)
    else
        Global.UI.setAttribute("command", "active", false)
    end
    if phaseNumber>=6 and phaseNumber<=8 then
        Global.UI.setAttribute("rollDice", "active", true)
    else
        Global.UI.setAttribute("rollDice", "active", false)
    end
end

function writeIngameMenu()
    self.createButton(deployIngameBtn)
    self.createButton(areaBtn)
    btnA.label=btnALbl..deployBag[deploySelected].getName()
    btnB.label=btnBLbl..itcBag[itcSelected].getName()

    if checkEnd == false then
        self.createButton(btnA)
        --self.createButton(btnB)
        self.createButton(passPhaseBtn)
        if phaseNumber>0 then
            phaseNameBtn.label=phaseName[phaseNumber]
            self.createButton(phaseNameBtn)
            manageUI()
        end

    end


end

function startGame()
    --local playerList=Player.getPlayers()
    local numberOfPlayers=0
    --for i, p in ipairs(playerList) do
    --    numberOfPlayers=numberOfPlayers+1
    --end
    if Player["Red"].seated then
        numberOfPlayers=numberOfPlayers+1
    end
    if Player["Orange"].seated then
        numberOfPlayers=numberOfPlayers+1
    end
    if Player["Blue"].seated then
        numberOfPlayers=numberOfPlayers+1
    end
    if Player["Teal"].seated then
        numberOfPlayers=numberOfPlayers+1
    end
    if numberOfPlayers < 2 then
        broadcastToAll("Must have at least 2 players seated", {1,0,0})
        if simulation == false then
            return
        end
    end
    Global.call("recordPlayers")
    inGame=true
    WebRequest.get("http://campaign40k.altervista.org/campaign/statistics.php?name=ApocGame", none)
    startCustomTurns()

    recallAllDeploy()
    deploymentIngamePlaced=false
    areaPlaced = false
    --gameTurnCounter.setPosition({40,-1.32,0})
    btnA.label=btnALbl..deployBag[deploySelected].getName()
    btnB.label=btnBLbl..itcBag[itcSelected].getName()
    writeMenus()
end

function passPhase()
    phaseNumber = phaseNumber + 1
    -- 1 INITIATIVE , 2 COMMAND Reinforcementes, 3 COMMAND Assets, 4 COMMAND Orders, 5 ACTION, 6 DAMAGE Damage, 7 DAMAGE Morale
    if phaseNumber > #phaseName then
        phaseNumber = 1
    end
    if phaseNumber == 1 then
        gameTurnCounter.Counter.increment()
        gameTurnCounter.call("checkGameEnd")
    end

    --print(phaseName[currenPhase])

    broadcastToAll(phaseName[phaseNumber], "Yellow")
    writeMenus()
end

function startCustomTurns()
    passPhase()
end





function hideShowDeployMenu()
    if deployMenu==false then
        deployMenu=true
    else
        deployMenu=false
        deployMenu=true -- for always open menu
    end
    writeMenus()
end

function hideShowITCMenu()
    if itcObjMenu==false then
        itcObjMenu=true
    else
        itcObjMenu=false
        itcObjMenu=true -- for always open menu
    end
    writeMenus()
end

function recallAllDeploy()
    for i=1,numberDeployZones do
        deployBag[i].call("buttonClick_recall")
    end
end

function placeDeploy()
    recallAllDeploy()
    if deploySelected <=  numberDeployZones then
        deployBag[deploySelected].call("buttonClick_place")
    end

end

function togglePregameDeploy()
    if deploymentPregamePlaced == false then -- place

        if deploySelected <=  numberDeployZones then
            deployBag[deploySelected].call("buttonClick_place")
        end
        deploymentPregamePlaced= true
    else                                    -- recall

        if deploySelected <=  numberDeployZones then
            deployBag[deploySelected].call("buttonClick_recall")
        end
        deploymentPregamePlaced= false
    end
end

function deployUp()
    deploymentPregamePlaced=true
    deploySelected=deploySelected+1
    if deploySelected > numberDeployZones+1 then
        deploySelected=1
    end
    if deploySelected == numberDeployZones+1 then
        deploymentPregamePlaced=false
    end
    writeMenus()
    placeDeploy()
end

function deployDown()
    deploymentPregamePlaced=true
    deploySelected=deploySelected-1
    if deploySelected < 1 then
        deploySelected=numberDeployZones+1
    end
    if deploySelected == numberDeployZones+1 then
        deploymentPregamePlaced=false
    end
    writeMenus()
    placeDeploy()
end

function recallAllItc()
    for i=1,numberItcZones do
        itcBag[i].call("buttonClick_recall")
    end
end

function placeItc()
    recallAllItc()
    if itcSelected <=  numberItcZones then
        itcBag[itcSelected].call("buttonClick_place")
    end

end

function itcUp()
    itcSelected=itcSelected+1
    if itcSelected > numberItcZones+1 then
        itcSelected=1
    end
    writeMenus()
    placeItc()
end

function itcDown()
    itcSelected=itcSelected-1
    if itcSelected < 1 then
        itcSelected=numberItcZones+1
    end
    writeMenus()
    placeItc()
end

function toggleSheet()
    numberOfSheet=numberOfSheet+1
    if numberOfSheet>2 then
        numberOfSheet=0
    end
    if numberOfSheet==0 then

        sheetBag[1].call("buttonClick_recall")
        sheetBag[2].call("buttonClick_recall")
        itcSheetBtn.label=sheetEnableLbl
        --sheetBag.call("buttonClick_place")
    end
    if numberOfSheet==1 then
        sheetBag[1].call("buttonClick_place")
        sheetBag[2].call("buttonClick_recall")
        itcSheetBtn.label=sheetEnable2Lbl
    end
    if numberOfSheet==2 then
        sheetBag[1].call("buttonClick_recall")
        sheetBag[2].call("buttonClick_place")
        itcSheetBtn.label=sheetDisableLbl
    end
    writeMenus()
end

function showHideIngameDeployment()
    if deploymentIngamePlaced == false then -- place
        deployIngameBtn.label=deployIngameLblOpen
        if deploySelected <=  numberDeployZones then
            deployBag[deploySelected].call("buttonClick_place")
        end
        deploymentIngamePlaced= true
    else                                    -- recall
        deployIngameBtn.label=deployIngameLblClosed
        if deploySelected <=  numberDeployZones then
            deployBag[deploySelected].call("buttonClick_recall")
        end
        deploymentIngamePlaced= false
    end
    writeMenus()
end

function showHideAreaDeny()
    if areaPlaced == false then -- place
        areaBtn.label=areaLblOpen
        areaBag.call("buttonClick_place")
        areaPlaced= true
    else                                    -- recall
        areaBtn.label=areaLblClosed
        areaBag.call("buttonClick_recall")
        areaPlaced= false
    end
    writeMenus()
end

function recallAll()
    recallAllItc()
    recallAllDeploy()
    KTitems.call("buttonClick_recall")
    areaBag.call("buttonClick_recall")
end

function none()
end

function writeMenu()
    self.createButton(redBtn)
    self.createButton(orangeBtn)
    self.createButton(blueBtn)
    self.createButton(tealBtn)
    self.createButton(deleteBtn)
end

function click_Red(obj, color, alt)
    if color ~= "Red" then
        return
    end
    armyZone=spawnObject(armyZoneData)
    Wait.frames(placeToRed, 3)
end

function click_Orange(obj, color, alt)
    if color ~= "Orange" then
        return
    end
    armyZone=spawnObject(armyZoneData)
    Wait.frames(placeToOrange, 3)
end

function click_Blue(obj, color, alt)
    if color ~= "Blue" then
        return
    end
    armyZone=spawnObject(armyZoneData)
    Wait.frames(placeToBlue, 3)
end


function click_Teal(obj, color, alt)
    if color ~= "Teal" then
        return
    end
    armyZone=spawnObject(armyZoneData)
    Wait.frames(placeToTeal, 3)
end

function placeToRed()
    placeTo(-1, 36, 90, redMat)
end

function placeToOrange()
    placeTo(-1,-36, 90, orangeMat)
end

function placeToBlue()
    placeTo(1, 36,-90, blueMat)
end

function placeToTeal()
    placeTo(1, -36, -90, tealMat)
end

function placeTo(zPos, xPos, rot, newImgTable )
    local mat=nil
    --local newImg=redArmyMat
    local armyMinis=armyZone.getObjects()
    local newPos={}
    local newRot={}
    for i, mini in ipairs(armyMinis) do
        if mini ~= self then

        newPos={-zPos*mini.getPosition().z+xPos, mini.getPosition().y, zPos *mini.getPosition().x+(24*zPos)}
        if mini.getVar("BCBtype") == "CommandAssetDeck" then
            if zPos<0 and xPos>0 then --red
                newPos={60,2,49.5}
                mini.setRotation({0,180,180})
            end
            if zPos<0 and xPos<0 then --orange
                newPos={-12,2,49.5}
                mini.setRotation({0,180,180})
            end
            if zPos>0 and xPos>0 then --blue
                newPos={12,2,-49.5}
                mini.setRotation({0,180,180})
            end
            if zPos>0 and xPos<0 then --teal
                newPos={-60,2,-49.5}
                mini.setRotation({0,180,180})
            end

        end
        mini.setPosition(newPos)
        mini.setLock(false)
        if mini.getVar("BCBtype") == "armyMat" then
            mat=mini
            mini.setLock(true)
        end
        end
    end
    for i, mini in ipairs(armyMinis) do
        if mini ~= self then
            newRot={mini.getRotation().x, mini.getRotation().y+rot, mini.getRotation().z}
            mini.setRotation(newRot)
        end
    end
    armyZone.destroy()
    if mat ~= nil and allowChangeMat then
        local custom= mat.getCustomObject()
        local change=false
        for i=1,#grayMat do
            if custom.image == grayMat[i] then
                custom.image=newImgTable[i]
                --[[
                if zPos== -1 then --red
                    custom.image=redMat[i]

                end
                if zPos== 1 then --blue
                    custom.image=blueMat[i]
                end
                ]]
                change=true
            end
            if change then
                break
            end
        end
        if change then
            mat.setCustomObject(custom)
            mat.reload()
        end
    end
    self.clearButtons()
end



function click_Delete()
    armyZone=spawnObject(armyZoneData)
    Wait.frames(deleteArmy, 3)
end

function deleteArmy()
    local armyMinis=armyZone.getObjects()
    for i, mini in ipairs(armyMinis) do
            mini.destroy()
    end
    armyZone.destroy()
    self.clearButtons()
end

button = {}

playerOneTitle = {
		index = 0,
		width = 2500,

		click_function = 'p2',
		font_size = 400,

}

}


function onload(save_data)
	self.createButton( playerOneTitle )
	self.createButton( playerTwoTitle )
	self.createButton( playerTotal[1] )
	self.createButton( playerTotal[2] )

	local b_xpos = -4
	local b_ypos = -6
	local b_index = 4

	for i=1,6 do
		button[i] = {}
		b_xpos = -4

		for j=1,2 do
			button[i][j] = {}

			for k=1,6 do
				local newButton = {
					index = 0,
					width = 500,
					height = 500,
					label = "0",
					click_function = 'nothing',
					font_size = 400,
					function_owner = self,
					position = {0, -0.05, 0},
					rotation = {0, 90, 180},
					tooltip = "Total 0-5"
				}

				newButton.index = b_index
				b_index = b_index + 1

				newButton.position = {b_ypos, -0.05, b_xpos}
				b_xpos = b_xpos + 1
				if k == 3 then
					b_ypos = b_ypos + 1
					b_xpos = b_xpos - 3
				end

				if k ~= 6 then
					newButton.click_function = 'toggle_' .. i .. j .. k
					newButton.label = ""
				end

				if k == 1 then
					newButton.tooltip = "Kill 1+"
				elseif k == 2 then
					newButton.tooltip = "Hold 1+"
				elseif k == 3 then
					newButton.tooltip = "Bonus"
				elseif k == 4 then
					newButton.tooltip = "Kill More"
				elseif k == 5 then
					newButton.tooltip = "Hold More"
				end

				button[i][j][k] = newButton
				self.createButton( button[i][j][k] )
			end

			b_xpos = 2
			b_ypos = b_ypos - 1
		end

		b_ypos = b_ypos + 2.5
	end


	button[7] = {}
	b_xpos = -2

	for i=1,6 do
		button[7][i] = {}

		local newButton = {
			index = 0,
			width = 500,
			height = 500,
			label = "0",
			click_function = 'nothing',
			font_size = 400,
			function_owner = self,
			position = {0, -0.05, 0},
			rotation = {0, 90, 180},
			tooltip = "Secondary"
		}

		newButton.index = b_index
		b_index = b_index + 1

		newButton.position = {b_ypos, -0.05, b_xpos}

		button[7][i][1] = newButton
		self.createButton( button[7][i][1] )

		local ind = secIndex(i)

		for j=1,2 do
			local smallButton = {
				index = 0,
				width = 250,
				height = 250,
				label = "",
				click_function = 'nothing',
				font_size = 200,
				function_owner = self,
				position = {0, -0.05, 0},
				rotation = {0, 90, 180},
				tooltip = ""
			}

			smallButton.index = b_index
			b_index = b_index + 1

			if j == 1 then
				smallButton.position = {b_ypos - 0.25, -0.05, b_xpos - 0.75}
				smallButton.label = "+"
				smallButton.click_function = 'plus_' .. ind[1] .. ind[2]
			else
				smallButton.position = {b_ypos + 0.25, -0.05, b_xpos - 0.75}
				smallButton.label = "-"
				smallButton.click_function = 'sub_' .. ind[1] .. ind[2]
			end

			button[7][i][j+1] = smallButton
			self.createButton( button[7][i][j+1] )
		end

		local nameButton = {
			index = 0,
			width = 1750,
			height = 350,
			label = "",
			click_function = 'nothing',
			font_size = 200,
			function_owner = self,
			position = {0, -0.05, 0},
			rotation = {0, 90, 180},
			tooltip = "Click to cycle secondary objective"
		}

		nameButton.index = b_index
		b_index = b_index + 1

		nameButton.position = {b_ypos, -0.05, b_xpos - 3.25}
		nameButton.click_function = 'sec_' .. ind[1] .. ind[2]

		button[7][i][4] = nameButton
		self.createButton( button[7][i][4] )



		b_ypos = b_ypos + 1

		if i == 3 then
			b_ypos = b_ypos - 3
			b_xpos = 4
		end
	end

	if saved_data ~= "" then
		local data = JSON.decode(save_data)

		primary = data.primary
		secondary = data.secondary

		for i=1,6 do
			for j=1,2 do
				for k=1,6 do
					updatePrimary(i, j ,k)
				end
			end
		end

		for n=1,2 do
			for m=1,3 do
				updateSecondary(n, m)

				local v = secondary[n][m][1]
				local l = 0

				if n == 1 then
					l = m
				else
					l = m + 3
				end

				button[7][l][4].label = secNames[v][1]
				button[7][l][4].tooltip = secNames[v][2]
				self.editButton( button[7][l][4] )
			end
		end
	end
end


function onSave()
	local save_data = {
		primary = primary,
		secondary = secondary
	}
	return JSON.encode(save_data)
end


function update()
	local params = getParams()

	if playerOneTitle.label ~= params.P1 then
		playerOneTitle.label = params.P1
		self.editButton(playerOneTitle)
		playerTotal[1].tooltip = params.P1
	end

	if playerTwoTitle.label ~= params.P2 then
		playerTwoTitle.label = params.P2
		self.editButton(playerTwoTitle)
		playerTotal[2].tooltip = params.P2
	end

	if version ~= params.ver then
		params.ver = version
		self.setDescription(JSON.encode_pretty(params))
	end
end


function nothing()
end

function plusOne(x, y)
	if secondary[x][y][2] < 4 then
		secondary[x][y][2] = secondary[x][y][2] + 1
		updateSecondary(x, y)
	end
end

function subOne(x, y)
	if secondary[x][y][2] > 0 then
		secondary[x][y][2] = secondary[x][y][2] - 1
		updateSecondary(x, y)
	end
end

function updateSecondary(x, y)
	local w = 0
	if x == 1 then
		w = y
	else
		w = y + 3
	end

	button[7][w][1].label = tostring( secondary[x][y][2] )
	self.editButton(button[7][w][1])

	playerTotal[x].label = tostring( playerSum(x) )
	self.editButton(playerTotal[x])
	if playerSum(x) ~= 0 then
		getObjectFromGUID(victoryCounterGuid[x]).Counter.setValue(playerSum(x))
	end
end

function toggle(value)
	if value == 1 then
		return 0
	end
	return 1
end

function toggle_other(value, other)
	if value == 1 then
		return 0
	end
	return other
end

function toggle_xyz(x, y, z)
	primary[x][y][z] = toggle( primary[x][y][z] )
	updatePrimary(x, y ,z)
end

function toggle_other_xyz(x, y, z)
	w = 3 - y
	primary[x][w][z] = toggle_other( primary[x][y][z], primary[x][w][z] )
	updatePrimary(x, w ,z)
end

function toggleToStr(value)
	if value == 1 then
		return "X"
	end
	return ""
end

function updatePrimary(x, y ,z)
	button[x][y][z].label = toggleToStr( primary[x][y][z] )
	self.editButton(button[x][y][z])

	button[x][y][6].label = tostring( battleRoundSum( primary[x][y] ) )
	self.editButton(button[x][y][6])

	playerTotal[y].label = tostring( playerSum(y) )
	self.editButton(playerTotal[y])
	if playerSum(y) ~= 0 then
		getObjectFromGUID(victoryCounterGuid[y]).Counter.setValue(playerSum(y))
	end
end

function battleRoundSum(values)
	local sum = 0

	for i = 1,5 do
		sum = sum + values[i]
	end

	return sum
end

function playerSum(pId)
	local sum = 0

	for j = 1,6 do
		sum = sum + battleRoundSum( primary[j][pId] )
	end
	for k = 1,3 do
		sum = sum + secondary[pId][k][2]
	end

	return sum
end

function getParams()
	local params = JSON.decode( self.getDescription() )

	if params == nil then
		params = {
			P1 = "Player 1",
			P2 = "Player 2",
			ver = ""
		}

		self.setDescription(JSON.encode_pretty(params))
	end

	return params
end

function secIndex(x)
	return {math.ceil(x/3), math.fmod(x-2,3)+2}
end

function p1(obj, clicker)
	local params = getParams()
	local playerName = Player[clicker].steam_name

	if string.len( playerName ) > 10 then
		playerName = string.sub( playerName, 1, 10 )
	end

	params.P1 = playerName
	self.setDescription(JSON.encode_pretty(params))
end
function p2(obj, clicker)
	local params = getParams()
	local playerName = Player[clicker].steam_name

	if string.len( playerName ) > 10 then
		playerName = string.sub( playerName, 1, 10 )
	end

	params.P2 = playerName
	self.setDescription(JSON.encode_pretty(params))
end

function sec_xy(x, y)
	local value = secondary[x][y][1]

	if value >= 15 then
		value = 0
	else
		value = value + 1
	end

	local i = 1
	while (i <= 3 and value ~= 0) do
		if secondary[x][i][1] == value then
			if value >= 11 then
				value = 0
			else
				value = value + 1
				i = 0
			end
		end
		i = i + 1
	end

	secondary[x][y][1] = value

	local w = 0
	if x == 1 then
		w = y
	else
		w = y + 3
	end

	button[7][w][4].label = secNames[ value ][1]
	button[7][w][4].tooltip = secNames[ value ][2]
	self.editButton( button[7][w][4] )
end

sizeValue={{2,1,2},{2.66,1,2},{3.33,1,2},{4,1,2}}
positionValue2={{-12,-9.52,0},{0,-9.52,0},{12,-9.52,0},{12,-9.52,0}}
positionValue={{0,-9.52,0},{0,-9.52,0},{0,-9.52,0},{0,-9.52,0},{0,-9.52,0},{0,-9.52,0}}
sizeName={
    "A p o c a l y p s e   -   6' x 6'",
    "A p o c a l y p s e   -   8' x 6'",
    "A p o c a l y p s e   -   10' x 6'",
    "A p o c a l y p s e   -   12' x 6'"
}


menuX=0
menuZ=32
arrowOffset=7.5

sizeSelected=2
sizeConfirmed=false

sizeMenuBtn={
    index=1, label="S E L E C T     B A T T L E F I E L D     S I Z E", click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={menuX,5,menuZ-1.35}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=450, width=8000,
    font_size=300, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
}

sizeBtn={
    index= i, label="Zone", click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={-menuX,5,menuZ}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=450, width=6000,
    font_size=300, color={0.6,0.6,0.6}, font_color={0,0,0}
}
sizeUpBtn={
    index=1, label="->", click_function="sizeUp", function_owner=self,
    position={-menuX+arrowOffset,5,menuZ}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=450, width=800,
    font_size=300, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
}
sizeDownBtn={
    index=1, label="<-", click_function="sizeDown", function_owner=self,
    position={-menuX-arrowOffset,5,menuZ}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=450, width=800,
    font_size=300, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
}
confirmBtn={
    index= i, label="C O N F I R M\n(no more changes)", click_function="resizeMat", function_owner=self,
    position={-menuX,5,menuZ+2.3}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=1400, width=4400,
    font_size=500, color={0,0.7,0}, font_color={0,0,0}
}

function refreshMat()
    mat = getObjectFromGUID("4ee1f2")
end

function onSave()
    saved_data = JSON.encode({
                                svsizeSelected=sizeSelected,
                                svsizeConfirmed=sizeConfirmed
                            })

    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)

    self.setPosition({86,-4,0})
    --self.setScale({1,1,1})
    self.setScale({1.3,1,1.3})
    self.interactable=false
    startObject= getObjectFromGUID("738804")
    mat = getObjectFromGUID("4ee1f2")
    mat.setPosition({0,-9.52,0})

    --mat.setScale({0.5,0.5,0.5})
    if saved_data ~= "" then
         local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
         sizeSelected = loaded_data.svsizeSelected
         sizeConfirmed = loaded_data.svsizeConfirmed
    end
    writeMenu()
end



function writeMenu()
    self.clearButtons()
    if sizeConfirmed then
        return
    end
    self.createButton(sizeMenuBtn)
    sizeBtn.label=sizeName[sizeSelected]
    self.createButton(sizeBtn)
    self.createButton(sizeUpBtn)
    self.createButton(sizeDownBtn)
    self.createButton(confirmBtn)
    mat.setScale(sizeValue[sizeSelected])
    mat.setPosition(positionValue[sizeSelected])
end

function sizeUp()
    sizeSelected=sizeSelected+1
    if sizeSelected > #sizeValue then
        sizeSelected=1
    end
    writeMenu()

end

function sizeDown()
    sizeSelected=sizeSelected-1
    if sizeSelected < 1 then
        sizeSelected=#sizeValue
    end
    writeMenu()

end

function resizeMat()
    sizeConfirmed=true
    mat.setScale(sizeValue[sizeSelected])
    mat.setPosition(positionValue[sizeSelected])
    startObject.setRotation({0,270,0})
    startObject.setVar("matSize", sizeSelected)
    startObject.call("assignDeployBags")
    startObject.call("writeMenus")
    writeMenu()
    --self.destroy()
end

function none()
end

ObjectStates.Name: Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {["ml"]=memoryList}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        memoryList = loaded_data.ml
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        memoryList = {}
    end

    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
function createSetupButton()
    self.createButton({
        label="Setup", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end

--Triggered by setup button,
function buttonClick_setup()
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects()
    createSetupActionButtons()
end

--Creates selection buttons on objects
function createButtonsOnAllObjects()
    local howManyButtons = 0
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        if obj ~= self then
            local dummyIndex = howManyButtons
            --On a normal bag, the button positions aren't the same size as the bag.
            globalScaleFactor = 1.25 * 1/self.getScale().x
            --Super sweet math to set button positions
            local selfPos = self.getPosition()
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(selfPos, objPos, obj)
            local objPos = rotateLocalCoordinates(deltaPos, self)
            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(dummyIndex, obj) end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=1000, width=1000,
                color={0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6},
            })
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Cancel", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=1100,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Submit", click_function="buttonClick_submit", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2.8}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=1100,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Reset", click_function="buttonClick_reset", function_owner=self,
        position={-2,0.3,0}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end


--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(index, obj)
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}
    if memoryList[obj.getGUID()] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    self.clearButtons()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Selection Canceled", {1,1,1})
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        broadcastToAll("You cannot submit without any selections.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    else
        self.clearButtons()
        createMemoryActionButtons()
        local count = 0
        for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
            count = count + 1
            local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
            if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
        end
        broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
        updateSave()
    end
end

--Resets bag to starting status
function buttonClick_reset()
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    createSetupButton()
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Tool Reset", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end


--After Setup


--Creates recall and place buttons
function createMemoryActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Place", click_function="buttonClick_place", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Recall", click_function="buttonClick_recall", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2.8}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Setup", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={-2,0.3,0}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPosition(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotation(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    --broadcastToAll("Objects Placed", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    --broadcastToAll("Objects Recalled", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local deltaPos = {}
    local bounds = obj.getBounds()
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
	local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
	local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
	local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
	--return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
  local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
  return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end

        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPosition(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotation(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    --broadcastToAll("Objects Placed", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    --broadcastToAll("Objects Recalled", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local deltaPos = {}
    local bounds = obj.getBounds()
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
	local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
	local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
	local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
	--return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
  local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
  return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end

ObjectStates.Name: Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {["ml"]=memoryList}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        memoryList = loaded_data.ml
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        memoryList = {}
    end

    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
function createSetupButton()
    self.createButton({
        label="Setup", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end

--Triggered by setup button,
function buttonClick_setup()
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects()
    createSetupActionButtons()
end

--Creates selection buttons on objects
function createButtonsOnAllObjects()
    local howManyButtons = 0
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        if obj ~= self then
            local dummyIndex = howManyButtons
            --On a normal bag, the button positions aren't the same size as the bag.
            globalScaleFactor = 1.25 * 1/self.getScale().x
            --Super sweet math to set button positions
            local selfPos = self.getPosition()
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(selfPos, objPos, obj)
            local objPos = rotateLocalCoordinates(deltaPos, self)
            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(dummyIndex, obj) end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=1000, width=1000,
                color={0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6},
            })
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Cancel", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=1100,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Submit", click_function="buttonClick_submit", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2.8}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=1100,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Reset", click_function="buttonClick_reset", function_owner=self,
        position={-2,0.3,0}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end


--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(index, obj)
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}
    if memoryList[obj.getGUID()] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    self.clearButtons()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Selection Canceled", {1,1,1})
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        broadcastToAll("You cannot submit without any selections.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    else
        self.clearButtons()
        createMemoryActionButtons()
        local count = 0
        for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
            count = count + 1
            local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
            if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
        end
        broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
        updateSave()
    end
end

--Resets bag to starting status
function buttonClick_reset()
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    createSetupButton()
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Tool Reset", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end


--After Setup


--Creates recall and place buttons
function createMemoryActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Place", click_function="buttonClick_place", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Recall", click_function="buttonClick_recall", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2.8}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}

    self.createButton({

end

end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()

        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    --broadcastToAll("Objects Recalled", {1,1,1})

            lock=obj.getLock()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    self.clearButtons()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Selection Canceled", {1,1,1})
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        broadcastToAll("You cannot submit without any selections.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    else
        self.clearButtons()
        createMemoryActionButtons()
        local count = 0
        for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
            count = count + 1
            local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
            if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
        end
        broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
        updateSave()
    end
end

--Resets bag to starting status
function buttonClick_reset()
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    createSetupButton()
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Tool Reset", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end


--After Setup


--Creates recall and place buttons
function createMemoryActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Place", click_function="buttonClick_place", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Recall", click_function="buttonClick_recall", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2.8}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Setup", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={-2,0.3,0}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPosition(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotation(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    --broadcastToAll("Objects Placed", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    --broadcastToAll("Objects Recalled", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local deltaPos = {}
    local bounds = obj.getBounds()
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
	local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
	local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
	local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
	--return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
  local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
  return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {["ml"]=memoryList}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        memoryList = loaded_data.ml
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        memoryList = {}
    end

    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
function createSetupButton()
    self.createButton({
        label="Setup", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end

--Triggered by setup button,
function buttonClick_setup()
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects()
    createSetupActionButtons()
end

--Creates selection buttons on objects
function createButtonsOnAllObjects()
    local howManyButtons = 0
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        if obj ~= self then
            local dummyIndex = howManyButtons
            --On a normal bag, the button positions aren't the same size as the bag.
            globalScaleFactor = 1.25 * 1/self.getScale().x
            --Super sweet math to set button positions
            local selfPos = self.getPosition()
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(selfPos, objPos, obj)
            local objPos = rotateLocalCoordinates(deltaPos, self)
            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(dummyIndex, obj) end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=1000, width=1000,
                color={0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6},
            })
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Cancel", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=1100,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Submit", click_function="buttonClick_submit", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2.8}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=1100,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Reset", click_function="buttonClick_reset", function_owner=self,
        position={-2,0.3,0}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end


--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(index, obj)
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}
    if memoryList[obj.getGUID()] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock()

        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}

        obj.highlightOff()
    end

        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()

            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(dummyIndex, obj) end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=1000, width=1000,
                color={0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6},
            })
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Cancel", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=1100,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Submit", click_function="buttonClick_submit", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2.8}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=1100,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Reset", click_function="buttonClick_reset", function_owner=self,
        position={-2,0.3,0}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end


--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(index, obj)
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}
    if memoryList[obj.getGUID()] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    self.clearButtons()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Selection Canceled", {1,1,1})
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        broadcastToAll("You cannot submit without any selections.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    else
        self.clearButtons()
        createMemoryActionButtons()
        local count = 0
        for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
            count = count + 1
            local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
            if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
        end
        broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
        updateSave()
    end
end

--Resets bag to starting status
function buttonClick_reset()
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    createSetupButton()
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Tool Reset", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end


--After Setup


--Creates recall and place buttons
function createMemoryActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Place", click_function="buttonClick_place", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Recall", click_function="buttonClick_recall", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2.8}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Setup", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={-2,0.3,0}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPosition(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotation(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    --broadcastToAll("Objects Placed", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    --broadcastToAll("Objects Recalled", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local deltaPos = {}
    local bounds = obj.getBounds()
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
	local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
	local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
	local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
	--return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
  local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
  return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end

    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
  local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
  return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult

ObjectStates.Name: Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {["ml"]=memoryList}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        memoryList = loaded_data.ml
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        memoryList = {}
    end

    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
function createSetupButton()
    self.createButton({
        label="Setup", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end

--Triggered by setup button,
function buttonClick_setup()
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects()
    createSetupActionButtons()
end

--Creates selection buttons on objects
function createButtonsOnAllObjects()
    local howManyButtons = 0
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        if obj ~= self then
            local dummyIndex = howManyButtons
            --On a normal bag, the button positions aren't the same size as the bag.
            globalScaleFactor = 1.25 * 1/self.getScale().x
            --Super sweet math to set button positions
            local selfPos = self.getPosition()
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(selfPos, objPos, obj)
            local objPos = rotateLocalCoordinates(deltaPos, self)
            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(dummyIndex, obj) end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=1000, width=1000,
                color={0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6},
            })
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Cancel", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=1100,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Submit", click_function="buttonClick_submit", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2.8}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=1100,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Reset", click_function="buttonClick_reset", function_owner=self,
        position={-2,0.3,0}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end


--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(index, obj)
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}
    if memoryList[obj.getGUID()] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    self.clearButtons()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Selection Canceled", {1,1,1})
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        broadcastToAll("You cannot submit without any selections.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    else
        self.clearButtons()
        createMemoryActionButtons()
        local count = 0
        for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
            count = count + 1
            local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
            if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
        end
        broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
        updateSave()
    end
end

--Resets bag to starting status
function buttonClick_reset()
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    createSetupButton()
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Tool Reset", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end


--After Setup


--Creates recall and place buttons
function createMemoryActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Place", click_function="buttonClick_place", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Recall", click_function="buttonClick_recall", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.3,-2.8}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Setup", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={-2,0.3,0}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
        font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPosition(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotation(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    --broadcastToAll("Objects Placed", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    --broadcastToAll("Objects Recalled", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local deltaPos = {}
    local bounds = obj.getBounds()
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
	local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
	local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
	local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
	--return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
  local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
  return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end

    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPositionSmooth(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotationSmooth(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot,smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    --broadcastToAll("Objects Placed", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    --broadcastToAll("Objects Recalled", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local deltaPos = {}
    local bounds = obj.getBounds()
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
	local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
	local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
	local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
	--return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
  local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
  return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end
